title: Go Fishing
description: Attempt a basic check to fish for food from the rivers and lakes in your kingdom.
requirement: Must have at least one claimed hex that includes river or lake terrain.

criticalSuccess.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="food" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Gain 1d4 Food</button>

success.msg: <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="food" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Food</button>

criticalFailure.msg: You lose some fishers to tragic accidents; <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>
